SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class NetworkHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.NetworkHandler
public class NetworkHandler extends Object
This class is the controller of the network part of the server. It manages the connections with the clients and the broadcast of the messages. In particular protocol connection, when a message should be broadcast, the message is sent to all different connection protocols. Each protocol will send the message to all the clients connected to it. Each protocol has a different way to send the message to the clients, but all its methods are override NetworkPlug.

  • Field Details

    • networkInterfacesAndConnections

      protected static HashMap<String,NetworkPlug> networkInterfacesAndConnections
      The HashMap is used to store the different protocols types. The key is the name of the protocol and the value is the protocol itself.

    • addNetworkPlug

      public void addNetworkPlug(String nameNetworkPlug, NetworkPlug networkPlug)
      Adds a new protocol to the networkInterfacesAndConnections HashMap.
      Parameters:
      nameNetworkPlug - The name of the protocol.
      networkPlug - The protocol itself. ServerRMI, ServerSocket...

    • finalizingNumberOfPlayersBroadcast

      public void finalizingNumberOfPlayersBroadcast()
      This method is responsible for broadcasting a message to all connected clients when the number of players in the game has been finalized. It first checks if the lobby is ready by calling `Controller.getInstance().lobbyIsReady()`. If the lobby is ready, it iterates over all the network interfaces and calls their respective `finalizingNumberOfPlayers` method. This method is only called when all players are ready, so the number of players is chosen and all players have entered the lobby.

    • gameIsStartingBroadcast

      public void gameIsStartingBroadcast()
      Broadcasts the message that the game is starting. Sends the message to all the different protocols. The message contains Starting Card unicast and Common Cards.

    • refreshUsersBroadcast

      public void refreshUsersBroadcast()
      Broadcasts the message of users in the game. The message is sent to all the different protocols. It contains the users in the game, and their colors.

    • sendingPlacedRootCardAndWhenCompleteObjectiveCardsBroadcast

      public void sendingPlacedRootCardAndWhenCompleteObjectiveCardsBroadcast(String nickname, boolean side, int cardId, boolean allWithRootCardPlaced) throws NoNameException
      Broadcasts the message of a player placing their root card and completing their objective cards. The message is sent to all the different protocols. It is called every time the player places a root card. To all players we send the new placed card. After if @param allWithRootCardPlaced is true, we send the objective cards to all players. (common broadcast and secret unicast)
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      side - The side of the card.
      cardId - The id of the card.
      allWithRootCardPlaced - A boolean indicating whether all players have placed their root cards.
      Throws:
      NoNameException - If a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • sendingHandsAndWhenSecretObjectiveCardsCompleteStartGameFlowBroadcast

      public void sendingHandsAndWhenSecretObjectiveCardsCompleteStartGameFlowBroadcast(String nickname, boolean allWithSecretObjectiveCardChosen) throws NoNameException
      Broadcasts the message of a player receiving their hand cards and completing their secret objective cards. The message is sent to all the different protocols.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      allWithSecretObjectiveCardChosen - A boolean indicating whether all players have chosen their secret objective cards.
      Throws:
      NoNameException - If a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • sendPlacedCardBroadcast

      public void sendPlacedCardBroadcast(String nickname, int cardId, Point position, boolean side) throws NoNameException
      Broadcasts the message of a player placing a card. It also sends the new points and resources of the player. It uses controller methods to get these information. The message is sent to all the different protocols.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      cardId - The id of the card that has been placed.
      position - The position where the card has been placed.
      side - The side chosen by the player. True for one side, false for the other.
      Throws:
      NoNameException - If a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • sendDrawnCardBroadcast

      public void sendDrawnCardBroadcast(String nickname, Integer newCardId, Kingdom headDeck, boolean gold, int onTableOrDeck) throws NoNameException
      Broadcasts the message of a player drawing a card. The message is sent to all the different protocols.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      newCardId - The id of the new card drawn.
      headDeck - The head of the deck, the new card is drawn from.
      gold - A boolean indicating whether the card is a gold card.
      onTableOrDeck - An integer indicating whether the card is on the table or deck.
      Throws:
      NoNameException - If a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • sendEndGameBroadcast

      public void sendEndGameBroadcast()
      Broadcasts the end game message to all connected clients. The message is sent to all the different protocols.

    • sendChatMessageBroadcast

      public void sendChatMessageBroadcast(String sender, String message)
      Broadcasts a chat message to all connected clients across all network interfaces. The message is sent to all the different protocols.
      Parameters:
      sender - The nickname of the client sending the message.
      message - The message to be sent.

    • disconnectBroadcast

      public void disconnectBroadcast()
      This method is used to disconnect all clients from all network interfaces. It iterates over all the network interfaces and calls their respective disconnectAll method.

    • notifyTurnBroadcast

      public void notifyTurnBroadcast()
      This method is used to notify all connected clients about the current turn across all network interfaces. It iterates over all the network interfaces and calls their respective notifyTurn method. The notifyTurn method in each network interface is responsible for broadcasting the current turn information to all clients connected via that interface.
